quality_assessment: Subsection provides excellent cross-references and accurate quick reference information. All internal links are valid. Minor enhancement suggestions for completeness.

issues.description: Quick reference lists format modifiers (:json, :lines, :csv, :*.ext) but implementation supports additional formats
issues.fix_suggestion: Add :comma and :newline format modifiers to the quick reference list for completeness. The implementation supports: default (space-separated), :json, :newline, :comma, and :*.ext (pattern filtering)

issues.description: Missing worker.id variable in map phase listing
issues.fix_suggestion: Add worker.id to the Map phase variables list: 'Map: item.*, item_index, item_total, worker.id + inherited setup captures'. The worker.id provides the parallel worker ID for the current agent.

issues.description: Metadata fields list could include validation variables
issues.current_content: All captured variables include .success, .exit_code, .stderr, and .duration fields
issues.fix_suggestion: Consider adding a note about validation-specific metadata: validation.completion, validation.gaps, validation.status for goal_seek commands

positive_aspects: All 6 internal cross-references are valid and properly linked
Excellent coverage of related documentation topics (Environment, Git Context, MapReduce, Commands, Examples, Troubleshooting)
Clear categorization of concepts (Built-in vs Custom, Phase Availability, Scoping, Format Modifiers, Metadata)
Helpful external resource links for JSONPath, Glob patterns, and jq
Comprehensive quick reference covering all major variable categories
Good coverage of git context variables and format modifiers
Clear explanation of custom capture metadata fields
improvement_suggestions: Add workflow metadata variables (workflow.name, workflow.id, workflow.iteration) to the quick reference
Include step metadata variables (step.name, step.index) in the quick reference
Consider adding a 'Common Patterns' section with typical variable usage examples
Add cross-reference to Git Context Advanced chapter for advanced filtering techniques

metadata.validation_focus: Check see also documentation matches implementation
